forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 62 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 54. West southwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon reveals a canvas of breezy sunshine, casting clarity over the cityscape as visibility stretches unobstructed towards the Golden Gate. The high, expectantly set near 65 degrees, dances between warmth and the coolness that the breeze so elegantly carries along. With the west-southwest winds gently teasing at around 13 mph, one can feel the subtle tug of the bay, yet there remains a comforting calm. This interplay of mild temperature and gentle gusts creates an atmosphere that feels both invigorating and inviting, perfect for those who appreciate a moment under expansive skies.

As twilight approaches, a soft blanket of clouds will weave gently through the evening, ushering a cooler low around 54 degrees. The pleasant undercurrents of the forecast suggest that the evening might beckon one to explore the local eateries, allowing a taste of the city's vibrant culinary offerings or perhaps a quiet stroll along the waterfront. Comfortable layers will serve well; a light jacket might suffice as the sun’s warmth gives way to cooler air. Whether one chooses to indulge in a leisurely dinner or simply lose oneself in the sights and sounds of the evening, the city offers a delightful backdrop for any endeavor.
